function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 in the built environment due to frequent behavioral changes and adjustments by retailers and consumers.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and outbreak within the community, leading to higher infection rates and potential strain on healthcare resources.","Mitigation":"Consistent and clear communication of guidelines, strict enforcement of safety measures, and education on best practices for infection control.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, automated temperature screening, and air filtration systems to reduce virus transmission in indoor spaces.","People":"Retail workers, consumers, and the general public in the community.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and retail businesses."}]}
